answers.answer: My due date is Jan 22 but I was already told that I wont make it full term.. This is baby number 1 for me and I am too super nervous.. Im having a baby boy!!

My due date is on the 23rd also!!! I have gestational diabetes, so it would seem that we are in a similiar situation. My baby is being measured in two days to see if he's growing too fast due to the GD. I hope everything works out for you!!!!!

question: My due date was not until the 23 but due to high sugar im being induced on the 6. While i can not wait to meet my baby girl i am nervous. My youngest is now ten and i only have boys. I have no clue what to do with a girl! Anyone else delivering early?
title: 5 days left
